content: Residential complex on Main Street: foundation poured, framing to start next week. Estimated six-month timeline.
metadata: Project code: RZ-921, client: Maple Homes, next milestone: framing inspection

content: Commercial tower in downtown district: steel skeleton nearly complete, next step is installing curtain walls.
metadata: Project code: CH-108, developer: Skyline Builders, structural engineer: EngiStruct LLC

content: Warehouse expansion project: floor slab done, waiting on steel deliveries. Expecting minor delay due to supplier shortage.
metadata: Project code: WH-431, typical steel lead time: 3 weeks

content: Riverfront condo units: piling stage completed, recommended geotechnical review before basement excavation.
metadata: Project code: RV-220, geotech firm: SoilCheck Inc.

content: School renovation wing: demolition finished, rough-in for plumbing/electrical started. Fire safety inspection scheduled.
